Module com.example.checkers
Package com.example.checkers.client.controllers

Class BoardController

java.lang.Object
com.example.checkers.client.controllers.Controller
com.example.checkers.client.controllers.BoardController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Initializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Board10x10Controller, Board8x8Controller
public abstract class BoardController extends Controller implements Initializable
Implements most of board8x8 and board10x10 functionality
